# rivestack_cluster_database (Resource)

Manages a database on a Rivestack HA PostgreSQL cluster.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "rivestack_cluster_database" "example" {
  cluster_id = rivestack_cluster.example.id
  name       = "analytics"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `cluster_id` (String) ID of the cluster.
- `name` (String) Database name.

### Optional

- `owner` (String) Database owner username. Defaults to the cluster's default user.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Resource identifier (cluster_id/name).
